name: Boom Blast
description:
"Boom Blast"

Destroy and Ascend!


Introducing an exciting single-level 2D platformer - "Boom Blast" from the indie creator "LazeHammy"! In this captivating game your mission is to return to your airship. However, various enemies and obstacles stand in your way.

What to do? You have a secret weapon - bombs! Detonate them to destroy all your enemies and overcome obstacles. You'll not only save yourself but also progress towards victory.

game Features

Captivating Platformer In A cartoonish Style.

Use Bombs to Obliterate Enemies and Obstacles.

Excellent Graphics and Sound Effects.

Simple Controls.


Join the adventure in "Boom Blast" and show everyone what you're capable of by setting a record for time! Save yourself and reach your airship. The path to victory begins with you!
